sources.full: SW5e: The Imperial Decryptor - A SW5e One-Shot

trait.name: Circuitry
entries: The MagnaGuard has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

trait.name: Droid Synergy
entries: Once per turn, the MagnaGuard can deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of a MagnaGuard ally that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Leap
entries: The MagnaGuard can expend all its movement on its turn to jump up to its current movement speed in any direction.
Mag-lock Limbs. The MagnaGuard can climb metal surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The MagnaGuard makes two electrostaff attacks.

action.name: Electrostaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) energy damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The droid adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the droid must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
